CHAPTER II: ON DRAWING, or THE ART OF DRAWING.
The Second Chapter.

div.ab:
1. One may call Drawing, or the exalted
art of Drawing, the Father of painting;1 Quoting Vasari I, 43. Vasari calls drawing the father of architecture, sculpture and painting; as Miedema points out, VM extends the arts to seven. Miedema 425.
and one can also praise it as the right path,
